meaningMnemonic: Technically this kanji is <kanji>heart</kanji> and <kanji>somebody</kanji>, but think about it this way. Where does everything come from inside somebody? The heart! It keeps things going by pumping blood, providing the foundation for both a good <vocabulary>mind and body</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
